programme.title: Premiership Rugby
programme.desc: A look back at the story of the 2024/25 Gallagher Premiership Rugby season, as Bath claimed the title for the first time since 1996.

programme.title: Premiership Rugby
programme.desc: We revisit the best tries of the 2024/25 Gallagher Premiership Rugby season, including Tom Roebuck, Kalaveti Ravouvou, Cadan Murley and many others.

programme.title: Live: FISU Summer World University Games
programme.desc: Coverage of the Women's Volleyball Gold Medal Game at the 2025 Summer World University Games in Rhine-Ruhr.

programme.title: Premiership Speedway
programme.desc: Highlights from round nine of the British Speedway ROWE Motor Oil Premiership as Leicester Lions and Sheffield Tigers face-off at Hydroscand Arena.

programme.title: Fight Week
programme.desc: A review of UFC 318 at Smoothie King Center, New Orleans, featuring Dustin Poirier's retirement fight against old foe Max Holloway.

programme.title: International T20 Cricket
programme.desc: Cricket action from the second T20 International between West Indies and Australia at Sabina Park.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as West Coast Eagles meet Richmond at Optus Stadium. The Tigers won 90-81 when these sides last met in round nine.

programme.title: All The Initial Of Full Moon Scimitar
Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan seeks help from psychiatrist Dr Jim. As she heals, Jim is haunted by the same disturbances when his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng, Vic Chow, Raymond Lam & Wu Chun, star in this tale that depicts how the seven sons of General Yang set out to rescue their father from an army of thousands.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer reunites with her estranged guitarist father, and along with other family members, they unite to support each other through their love for music.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: Produced by megastar Jay Chou, this drama starring Will Liu & Wang Jun Kai depicts how a former top team racing driver's focus on proving himself leads to his team's downfall.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A computer geek who has only been in love once suddenly & surprisingly finds himself getting romantically involved with five different women. Will he find "the-one"?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: This action crime drama stars Donnie Yen & Andy Lau as a drug kingpin and a corrupt policeman who team up to build an underworld empire in 1960s Hong Kong.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Adapted from a true story, a young girl named Mun undergoes a corneal transplant to correct her blindness, only to find herself gifted not only with sight but also the ability to see ghosts.

programme.title: Love Lies
programme.desc: Gynaecologist Veronica falls for an online dating app scam with young Joe, who poses as a French engineer. What begins as a romance built on lies ultimately transforms two seemingly mismatched souls.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: After a security engineer unwittingly becomes involved in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu waits 10 years for her first love, who marries another. Losing faith, she meets a wedding planner and a wealthy man, both offering solace. Torn between them, who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: Zhang Yi Mou's first spy thriller follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret mission in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo - only to be sold out by a traitor.

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: Sing, the SDU's top killer, is assigned by his superior to an unusual assignment - going undercover to locate his Chief's missing gun in high school.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: Mei Jing leads the Thunderbolt Women's Commando Unit to infiltrate the drug cartel in Dong Zhou area, but they were ambushed and her father's identity as an undercover is exposed.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: To make a living, Teddy accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. His career regains momentum after reunites with his long-lost daughter.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who can enter a person's subconscious. As she investigates a murder-cum-suicide case, she finds herself under suspicion and comes face-to-face with a past trauma...

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ten months after Yan's murder, Ming finds a new lead when he begins to suspect that Ming, a rising star in the force, is a triad mole.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The HK Police placed over a thousand undercover officers in various triads, attempting to bring down the country's largest criminal organization, prompting betrayal, deceit & murder.

programme.title: Silent Code
programme.desc: Reporter Lan research news from across a popular BBS forum. Xiang, a forum founder, creates space for netizens to share dreams and ideas but being the subject of heated debate due to a leaked video.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Andy Lau and Eric Tsang star in this thriller about a mole in the police department and an undercover cop, both of whom go all out to expose each other.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Fei meets young talent Wai who suffers from a rare disease, and helps Wai find his lost love. Even when they know the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of prison corruption to the ICAC. ICAC officer Luk goes undercover in prison to investigate and is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: I'm Livin' it
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint with a group of homeless people, with a plan to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Sifu VS Vampire
programme.desc: In a selfish grasp at financial gain, a TV station tycoon intimidates a feng shui master into relocating his great grandfather's coffin - and pays the price.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: A veteran and a passionate street dancer both strive to reach their goals and pursue their dreams in street dancing. After overcoming many challenges, can they finally shine on stage?

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as the Asian Hawk, a top agent sent to retrieve the bronze heads of twelve animals of the Chinese Zodiac, stolen in Beijing in 1860.

programme.title: Teletubbies 9
programme.desc: Teletubbies stars iconic characters; Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. Their world is full of love and laughter as they explore Home Dome and the magical countryside of Teletubbyland through play. Familiar and beloved features from the original series return - The Noo-noo, Tubby Custard, Tubby Toast, Baby Sun, rabbits and the Voice Trumpets - along with some brand new surprises. Look out for th

programme.title: Work It Out Wombats! 11
programme.desc: The Wombats organize the Treeborhood Talent Show. Malik and Zeke create their own Brother Day. Zadie makes noise with her Really Big, Really Loud Noisy Thing. The Wombats build a giant snow globe for Zeke. Super invents a Huggyback rider. Malik perfects a magic trick. The Wombats turn their one bedroom into three.
Dream Home is set to take the renovation genre to new heights as six pairs of everyday Aussies battle it out room by room, transforming tired suburban family homes into astonishing new dream homes.

It's the only unsolved air piracy case in history. In 1971, a man hijacks a Northwest Orient Airlines flight, demanding 4 parachutes and $200,000. He jumps out of the plane with the money and is never seen again. Can new evidence finally reveal the identity of the anonymous hijacker known as D.B. Cooper?

In 2015 Mercedes-AMG set out to crack one of the last barriers within the automotive industry: The first street legal Hypercar with F1 Technology. What was supposed to be the ultimate Highlight within the Motorsports Industry soon turned into a nightmare that put the image of the entire Mercedes Group on the spot. Failure was not an option.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE delivers the latest from Japan, Asia, and the rest of the world. While covering wide network of correspondents breaking news and developing stories, offering a perspective from this corner of the globe, a team of trusted anchors ties it all together to give you a picture of what's happening now, and what's ahead.

programme.desc: 'Kill or Be Killed' is the gripping exploration of self-defense murder cases, where law enforcement, prosecutors and defense attorneys unravel every detail, from the harrowing stories, forensics, interrogations and witness statements that led to the gruesome event in order to find answers. In our modern world, we tend to think that technology and scientific knowledge can help protect us from almost anything, including natural disasters. But is that really true? Or are we just as vulnerable today in the face of raging fires, violent earthquakes, and destructive hurricanes as our ancestors were in the past?

Season 3 of Australias real-life extreme version of hide and seek returns with an intense twist in the form of a large-scale heist. Nine pairs of ordinary Australians turn into shrewd Fugitives, starting with a robbery thatll see them stealth their way into Ballarat bank to steal up to $1 million dollars, before making their getaway to disappear without a trace. The goal is to make it to the e

There have been many serial killers throughout history, but none have inspired more fascination and fear than Jack the Ripper. Almost 140 years after the brutal slaying of his final victim, the mystery of his identity remains unsolved. Who was Jack the Ripper? And what compelled him to commit gruesome acts of murder?

ABC News' acclaimed series '20/20' has distinguished itself as one of the most esteemed news programs in broadcast journalism. Amid the heated, competitive environment of primetime entertainment, '20/20' has demonstrated its ability to consistently attract a significant segment of the viewing audience by offering viewers more choices and more chances to learn about the world around them.

After being abducted by Katarina Rostova, Raymond 'Red' Reddington (James Spader) finds himself alone in hostile territory, unsure of who, if anyone, he can trust. Surrounded by old enemies and new allies, Red must stay one step ahead of the Blacklist's most dangerous criminal, who will stop at nothing to unearth the very truth Red wants no one to know about. Structures of steel and iron eerily stand unfinished after they were abandoned midway in construction, covered in weeds, moss and rust, the show explores what they could have been.
